caption.p: Specific humidity and precipitation drive RSV transmission. a Model results for the predicted effect of specific humidity and precipitation on transmission. b Normalized monthly RSV cases before peak incidence (gray) and after peak incidence (yellow) against mean monthly humidity for four locations in the dataset, month-of-year shown in point. c Mean incidence averaged biennially for the same four locations demonstrating distinct dynamic patterns. d Seasonal trajectory in terms of humidity and precipitation for same locations in 2010 and 2100, month-of-year shown in point. e Boxplot showing seasonal change in transmission grouped by dynamic pattern.
